Articles.Content: Alright so please try to do your best to bear with me, what are the controls or how do you use the landing struts that come off the side and extend out and down?

Welcome to the forums!

You can use "g" on the keyboard to extend and retract them
If it's your first landing, bring more than three of them with you. Six is a good safe number with plenty of room for failure
Yea you can either hit g or click on the landing ears and click extend
